about_the_game:
My name is Jacob, and I'm 25 years old. I've heard a lot of rumors about an abandoned house where people claim to see strange things. But I'm not here for that. I'm here to find my brother. He went missing sometime in January of 1970, and his face was on one of those missing posters. The police searched, but they couldn't find any trace of him. So, I decided to take matters into my own hands.

The only clue I have is a message from my brother: 'FIND ME,' along with a picture of an old, abandoned house. As I explore the house, I come across a moment of eerie coincidence the power switches on, and the TV flickers to life. A VHS tape sits on the table, almost as if it's meant for me. I play it, hoping for answers, but little did I know, it would lead me into a dark and unsettling place...

But there is catch... Watch your back as the unseen entities may be lurking. Turning your journey into a chilling nightmare. There is a scientist calls you out of nowhere and he wants you dead badly...

Features Include
First person perspective
Jump scares
Horror aspects
Story
Music
Notes
Voice acting Jacob, As Main Character, Scientist Voice acting
Crossover SCP Universe

Game Development Team:
- [LEMIOUTGAMES/JACOB JUFEILI]

SCP Foundation Content:
- [SCP Foundation] - [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License]

Special Thanks:
- [Blex](Asset Contributor)
- [My Brother Paarthurnax ] (Inspiration for Main Villain The Scientist)
...

...


MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
The developers describe the content like this:

Contains horror elements that some people may find frightening/disturbing, flashing images, blood and gore, death, and mental illness/insanity. Contains swearing/foul language.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION
The developers describe the content like this:

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 - Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No Need
  • VR Support: No Need
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600 - Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No Need
  • VR Support: No Need

short_description: My name is Jacob, and I'm 25 years old. I've heard a lot of rumors about an abandoned house where people claim to see strange things. But I'm not here for that. I'm here to find my brother. He disappeared in January of 1970, I'll do whatever it takes to locate him, no matter what.
